hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn `Abbas:The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "No good deeds done on other days are superior to those done on these (first ten days of Dhul Hijja)." Then some companions of the Prophet (ﷺ) said, "Not even Jihad?" He replied, "Not even Jihad, except that of a man who does it by putting himself and his property in danger (for Allah's sake) and does not return with any of those things

chapter.ara-name: باب فَضْلِ الْعَمَلِ فِي أَيَّامِ التَّشْرِيقِ
chapter.eng-name: Superiority of deeds on the days of Tashriq
